p: O'nyong nyong fever (ONN) is an arboviral disease caused by an alphavirus of the Semliki Forest complex and closely related to chikungunya virus (CHIKV) ( Fig. 36.4.1 ). Like other members of this complex, O'nyong nyong virus (ONNV) causes a febrile arthralgic illness. It is unique among alphaviruses in its adaptation to Anopheles mosquito vectors, which are primarily responsible for its transmission.
